item.description: All of the "Big Four" companies, except JYP Entertainment, posted falls in profits for the third quarter of 2024.

item.title: Asia markets mixed as investors await China LPR, Japan inflation data this week
item.description: China is expected to keep its loan prime rates unchanged on Wednesday, while Japan's inflation numbers will be out on Friday.

item.title: CNBC Daily Open: From postelection rally to preelection levels
item.description: On Monday, the S&P and Dow hit milestones. It was only the start of the week, but little did we know we were beginning at the peak.

item.title: Morningstar names cheap stocks in a sector that 'deserves a place in everybody's portfolio'
item.description: The sector also "provides a good natural inflation hedge," Morningstar's David Sekera said.

item.title: These 2 active ETFs have outperformed the S&P 500 this year, last year and over 5 years
item.description: The two ETFs have been designed to systematically outperform the S&P 500.
